"Koffie": "<%me>. Good work. I am Officer Koffie."
"Because of the actions of ARKS members, we've discovered the Quarry on the planet Lillipa."
"For someone with your abilities, we don't need to do a search permission exam or application or anything."
"Please feel free to head out whenever you've got the time to conduct searches or missions."
"Now then, keep up the good work."
